mapper.select: SELECT c.comment_id, c.post_id, c.parent_comment_id, c.user_id, u.nickname AS nickname, c.content, c.status, c.status_changed_at, c.created_by, c.created_at AS createdAt, c.updated_by, c.updated_at AS updatedAt FROM comment c LEFT JOIN user_info u ON c.user_id = u.user_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY c.created_at DESC
SELECT category_id, category_name, sort_order, main_exposure, is_notice, created_by, created_at, updated_by, updated_at FROM category ORDER BY sort_order

SELECT b.board_id, b.category_id, c.category_name, b.board_name, b.board_level, b.sort_order, b.recommend_yn, b.created_by, b.created_at, b.updated_by, b.updated_at FROM board b JOIN category c ON b.category_id = c.category_id WHERE b.category_id = #{categoryId} ORDER BY b.sort_order

SELECT b.board_id, b.category_id, c.category_name, b.board_name, b.board_level, b.sort_order, b.recommend_yn, b.created_by, b.created_at, b.updated_by, b.updated_at FROM category c JOIN board b ON c.category_id = b.category_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId} ORDER BY b.sort_order
